params.timestamp_: The timestamp at which to calculate weight (for snapshot)
params.voteData_: Implementation-specific data needed for weight calculation
params.voter_: The address whose voting weight to calculate

getVotingWeightForPaymaster(address,uint.details: Avoids using block.timestamp and block.number which are banned opcodes

params.timestamp_: The timestamp at which to calculate weight
params.voter_: The address whose voting weight to calculate

returns.weight: The calculated voting weight (0 if not eligible)

calculateWeight(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Calculates voting weight for a voter at a specific timestamp

getVotingWeightForPaymaster(address,uint.notice: Calculates voting weight for paymaster validation (ERC-4337 gasless voting)
